data.title: Sir Martin Smith
data.meta_description: Founder of Smith School of Enterprise and the Environment, Oxford University Founder (2007), Smith School of Enterprise and the Environment, University of Oxford; Life President, Orchestra of the Age of Enlightenment; Senior Advisor, Glyndebourne Opera; Chairman Emeritus, GP Bullhound Ltd (2005-); Board Member or Trustee: Tetbury Music Festival (1999-); Client Earth (2016-);
